# Create New Programming Assignment

## Step 1: Gather Assignment Information
Agar mavzu berilmagan bo‘lsa, foydalanuvchidan so‘rang.

## Step 2: Create Assignment Structure
1. `assignments` papkasida mavzuga mos yangi papka yarating
2. Papkada `README.md` faylini [`assignment-template.md`](../../templates/assignment-template.md) strukturasiga mos yarating
3. README ichiga assignment tafsilotlarini kiriting
4. (Optional) Zarur bo‘lsa starter code yoki fayllarni ham shu papkaga qo‘shing

## Step 3: Update Website Configuration
`config.json` ichidagi assignments listini yangilang.  
`dueDate` maydoniga hozirgi sanadan 7 kun qo‘shing, agar foydalanuvchi boshqa vaqt ko‘rsatmasa.
